data.event: Underwood, a family practitioner at Licking Memorial from 1982-2006 and afterward in New Hampshire and Minnesota, left in January 2007 to practice in New Zealand after researching a brochure she'd received in the mail about the country.

event.title: a long time for things," Underwood said

data.event: "People have to wait a long time for things," Underwood said, citing examples such as tests or referrals.
